item.title: By: Foton of AFKGamer
item.dc:creator: Foton of AFKGamer
item.description:
Well no wonder diplomatic negotiations with the centaurs have soured. They're just trying to scrape out a living like the rest of us and here I am declaring war on them.
I feel like dirt.
Now the damn pirates -- they're on their own.
item.content:encoded:
Well no wonder diplomatic negotiations with the centaurs have soured. They’re just trying to scrape out a living like the rest of us and here I am declaring war on them.

I feel like dirt.

Now the damn pirates — they’re on their own.

item.title: By: Abalieno
item.dc:creator: Abalieno
item.description:
As Jeff said, those box are toggles you can use :)
Instead you cannot modify those marked as red. Only when you mark a faction to be at war you can attack.
item.content:encoded:
